definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: storm-wind (that makes an end ?);—abs. ´[[ס]] Is 5:28 +; [[סוּפָּ֫תָה]] Ho 8:7 (Ges:§ 90 f.); sf. [[סוּפָֽתְְ]] Ps 83:16; pl. [[סוּפוֹת]] Is 21:1; —strom-wind, ´[[כְּסַעַר בְּיוֹם ס]] Am 1:14, Na 1:3 (‖[[שְׂעָרָה]]), Is 17:13 (‖[[רוּחַ]]), Job 37:9, Is 21:1, as driving chaff Job 21:18 (vb. [[גׇּנַב]]; in sim.), sim. of rushing chariots Is 5:28, Is 66:15, Je 4:13, of ruin Pr 1:27 cf. Pr 10:25; symbol. of ´[[י]]'s judgments, [[יִקְחָׂרוּ]] ´[[רוּחַ יִזְâָרעוּ וְס]] Ho 8:7, Ps 83:16 (‖[[סַעַר]]), Job 27:20 (vb. [[גׇּנַב]]), Is 29:6 ( + [[מְעָרָה]]).
